author: Ryan Elliott
releaseNotes:
v0.1.4 - Added printing status attribute.
v0.1.3 - Minor tweaks.
v0.1.2 - Added print time left and print percent completion. Added current print file. Added rounding for fan speed %.
v0.1.1 - Add Actuator capability.
v0.1.0 - Creation.

For further information or to report issues/request features, please see the community thread https://community.hubitat.com/t/release-iotawatt-beta/116875
